subject: Re: [junit] Re: JUnit 4.x and support for Java 1.4
msgSnippet: ... Sadly that s not true - we re not allowed to have Java 1.5 anywhere in the build environment. Getting that ship to change directions for test code is
messageBody:
On 9/13/06, Neil Swingler <neil@...> wrote:
>
> Surely even if java 5 is not permitted in production code there can be
> no harm in using it to run a unit testing tool. Indeed starting with
> java 5 features in unit tests would be a good way to practice them
> without risking all on the production code.
>
> - Neil


Sadly that's not true - we're not allowed to have Java 1.5 anywhere in the
build environment. Getting that ship to change directions for test code is
impossible (believe I've tried).

Mark
----------------------------------------------------------------------
Blog: http://www.notesfromatooluser.com/
